```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

s_score_df <- read_csv("workflow/out/clustering_accuracy/silhouette_score_allBatches.csv")
```

```{r}
s_score_df <- s_score_df %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  distinct() %>%
  mutate(p_q_ratio = p/q)

s_score_df$n_walks <- factor(s_score_df$n_walks)
s_score_df$walk_length <- factor(s_score_df$walk_length)
```


```{r}
ggplot(s_score_df, aes(x = p_q_ratio, y = silhouette_score, color = dimensions, shape = n_walks)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_classic() +
  scale_color_viridis_c() +
  ggtitle("Silhouette score vs. P/Q")

ggplot(subset(s_score_df, n_walks == 50), aes(x = p_q_ratio, y = silhouette_score, color = dimensions, shape = walk_length)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_classic() +
  scale_color_viridis_c() +
  ggtitle("Silhouette score vs. P/Q")
  
```
